title: WTTF - Higher-Grade HOFers in only the following back variations

posts.post_title: WTTF - Higher-Grade HOFers in only the following back variations
posts.post_content:
AB 350 No Frame
AB 350 Frame

I also need a nice higher-grade Old Mill Southern Leaguer and a T215-1 Red Cross 

Have many good cards to trade, all with rare backs and all graded 5 or better.
